  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    class Game create player1 create player2 num_Battle: total Battle number in one game num_War: total war number in one game double_War: total double war number in one game

    • Method Detail

      • Compare

        public void Compare(Card c1,
                    Card c2)
        Compare(Card c1, Card c2) override constructor
        Parameters:
        c1 - first card
        c2 - second card if the first card has larger value, then player1 gets all the cards if player1 wins the card, the screen will display "Player1 wins" if there is a war, put card 1 and 2 into an temp list to temp storage if the deck has more than 4 card, both player flip three times if it's still a war, then double war count + 1 if one of the player has less than or equal to 4 cards, the game will compare te last card with another. if the player only has 1 card and both player has teh same card, this player lost the game
